description: The function seems to be vulnerable to a potential Denial of Service (DoS) attack. The function pushes notifications to a queue (_notificationsQueue) and processes them one by one. If an attacker can send a large number of notifications, it could cause the queue to grow indefinitely, consuming more and more memory and potentially leading to a crash due to resource exhaustion. This is related to CWE-400: Uncontrolled Resource Consumption ('Resource Exhaustion').
